translation.intro.message: Scan the floor to place the kiosk
translation.welcome.message: Welcome to ITRP AR. I'm Simon, your virtual agent. How can I help you?
translation.service.select.etms.message: You have selected monitoring emerging technologies
translation.service.select.return.message: What other service would you like to get help with?
translation.homepage.blurb: This is a prototype and does not imply any possibility of a future ESDC service where augmented/mixed reality is available/offered. The purpose of this prototype is to push the boundaries and see what a given technology could do.
translation.homepage.pcInstall: Chrome 87+ with WebXR API Emulator installed and configured.
translation.homepage.preBtn: Select the button below to launch the AR application!
